sentences.en: a pear tree
sentences.cn: 梨树

sentences.en: He ate a piece of pear.
sentences.cn: 他吃了一片梨.

sentences.en: He feared his career had gone a bit pear-shaped.
sentences.cn: 他害怕自己的事业已经出了点儿问题。

sentences.en: His cheek is stuffed with pear.
sentences.cn: 他的腮帮子里塞满梨.

sentences.en: I took this apple for a pear until I tasted it.
sentences.cn: 我误将这个苹果当作梨子，直到我尝了才知道。

sentences.en: In gardens, cankers are most prominent on apples and pear trees.
sentences.cn: 花园里，苹果树和梨树患枯枝病最明显。

sentences.en: Is it a pear?
sentences.cn: 这是一个梨子吗？

sentences.en: Just toss a cup of berries — strawberries, blueberries, raspberries — and a sliced (but not peeled) apple, peach, or pear into your blender.
sentences.cn: 把一杯莓子——草莓、蓝莓、山莓，还有一片没削皮的苹果、桃、或梨子放入你的搅拌机。

sentences.en: Pear trees are grafted on quince rootstocks.
sentences.cn: 梨树被嫁接到榅的根茎上。

sentences.en: Pick an orange, pick a pear.
sentences.cn: 摘一个橙子，摘一个梨子。

sentences.en: Scoop out the rotten part of the pear.
sentences.cn: 把梨烂的地方剜掉.

sentences.en: She pulled a pear from the pear.
sentences.cn: 她从树上摘下一只梨.

sentences.en: Sweeten dishes sparingly with honey, or con-centrated apple or pear juice.
sentences.cn: 加一点蜂蜜或浓缩苹果汁或梨汁，让菜带点甜味。

sentences.en: The pear blossom is beginning to drop.
sentences.cn: 梨花开始落下.

sentences.en: The pear had bruises of dark spots.
sentences.cn: 这个梨子有碰伤的黑斑.

sentences.en: The pear is a delicious fruit and I like it very much.
sentences.cn: 梨是好吃的水果,我喜欢它.

sentences.en: The pear is rotten to the core.
sentences.cn: 这梨全烂了.

sentences.en: The pear trees are blossoming out early this year.
sentences.cn: 今年梨树很早就在开花了。

sentences.en: There are lots of pear trees near the house.
sentences.cn: 屋子近旁种着许多梨树.

sentences.en: This pear tastes a bIt'sour.
sentences.cn: 这梨带点酸味.

sentences.en: Until his death in 1986 Greenwood owned and operated an enormous pear orchard.
sentences.cn: 到他1986年去世前，格林伍德一直拥有并管理着一片面积广阔的梨园。
